entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is described as being down-right alarming in himself, careworn, thinner, balder and greyer, with a crumpled look on his face. He is also mentioned to be the Prime Minister's acquaintance.

entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is described as having seen a similar careworn look in politicians before and it never boded well. He is also mentioned to have enough on his plate already without any extra helpings from Fudge.

relationships.description: Fudge and the Prime Minister are acquaintances, as indicated by their interaction in the scene where they meet to discuss some bad news.
